website_summaries.verdict: A simple radial tire that makes a great spare or replacement wheel.
pros: Designed to be used in both wet and dry conditions, making it good for a variety of weather and terrain environments
Deep treads provide better grip than typical trailer tires
Comes in a variety of sizes
cons: No rim included with the tire

customer_reviews.title: An 8 ply D load tire for less than four ply C load?
customer_reviews.text: An 8 ply D load tire for less than a 4 ply? I needed to replace one damage tire on a small fifth wheel. I received this tire two days after ordering and it appears to be of excellent quality. $15 for mounting at Costco. I've put about 1000 miles on it with no problems. An excellent by.
customer_reviews.author: R. Waldorf

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tire.Had my tire man mount them for me,which gave him time to do a 6 point inspection prior to mounting and answer my questions.I run 750 miles every-other with my trailer, rated at 2850lbs, normal load of 2000lbs.I check them every 2 hrs for temp,on a 360 walk around. The best tire I ever bought,runs cooler then most,quiet at speeds of 75-80.Exact tire recomended from the trailer manufacture,gives me pease of mind also. GOOD INVESTMENT.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: ... Michelin's but for half the price they are a great budget tire and are holding up well on a ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are no Michelin's but for half the price they are a great budget tire and are holding up well on a 7000lb 5th wheel. Mayb doesnt deserve 5 stars but well worth the price and always great delivery with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trailer tire they make! I got these for all of my trailers
customer_reviews.author: Mark Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great tires to your door
customer_reviews.text: Needed tires for the trailer and these were shipped fast. Plus no salesman to be hassled by :)
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Eckles

customer_reviews.title: A good tire for our trailer on our ranch roads
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 2 of theses tires. They are used on a trailer that we use to haul about 6000 lb bales of hay and/or 500 gallon tank of water to our cattle. On dirt/rough ranch roads. They have lasted longer than other tires we have bought which says a lot for our roads. We do prefer 10 ply but these have worked ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: No date on the tires when they were made !
customer_reviews.text: There was not a date on the tires when they were made. there is a federal law that all tires Shell have a date of when they were made.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good qaulity , great price.
customer_reviews.text: Put all four tires on a utility trailer, do a very good job with light and heavy loads, for the price delivered to your front door its a no brainer here.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and a great price. Mounted these tires (4) on my RV ...

customer_reviews.title: These may not be the best tires ever
customer_reviews.text: These may not be the best tires ever, but for a semi used trailer they have been great. I have taken these on some pretty bad roads, no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, arrived quickly and what just what I needed at a very reasonable price. Radial with high load range and appears to travel well. Used them on a 120 mile gravel highway in August. No issues

customer_reviews.title: the tires worked fine.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, good value
customer_reviews.text: Drove from FL to MN, almost 1800 miles and zero problems. They held the rated 60# of air without a whimper. Yes I would buy them again.

customer_reviews.text: This is a spare. The price was reasonable, the load bearing the same and shipping was fast. Good enough for what I bought it for!

customer_reviews.title: Great Radial Tires

customer_reviews.title: Tire blows out after jsut over a year after purchased new
customer_reviews.text: Tire was purchased new in July of 2016 and immediately placed on trailer. Trailer is always shedded and used infrequently. Tire had less than 500 miles of use in just over a year. Tire blew out while pulling the trailer empty on September 24, 2017. The tire or the trailer has ever seen a heavy load. Would not recommend this tire to anyone and I will not be replacing this blowout with this brand of tire. Can't find any information about any kind of warranty on this tire.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, wore evenly and did not bruise on the ALCAN Hey from AK to VA under an 8000 lb trailer. Tread did not chunk over what seemed like 200 cumulative miles on gravel roads.

I have only made 3 trips out there (approximately 300 miles total) on this tire and the sidewall just blew out today. I replaced both tires at the same time and now I am doubting the other one. Really wish they would warranty this since it has only been a month!

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: My two Labrabulls have gotten 2 whole days of play with these so far. That's a big deal! I purchased 2 to switch out so the main destroyer couldn't chew on one for too long. Most toys don't last longer than a few hours & these still float in the pool & squeak. They love them. I've gotten a lot of exercise in the last few days. Great for fetching in the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires.  Quality Looks Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My local tire shop wanted $460 for four like tires and installation. These are great looking tires and cost me about half as much. Works for me. Compared to the tires that originally came on my dump trailer, these are higher capacity and I expect will last 3 times as long. The original bias ply lasted about 3,000 miles of mostly light loads and highway mileage. These are made in China but, if you look around pretty much all trailer rated tires are these days. Even the much more expensive Goodyear Marathon trailer rated tires are these days...probably at the same factory.
customer_reviews.author: Buying FrenzyTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: ... is my 3 rd pair I bought they are great trailer tires I purchased 4 2 years ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3 rd pair I bought they are great trailer tires I purchased 4 2 years ago and this pair is for the back two tires that drag when turning the fronts have over 10,000 miles on them and still have at least a year or two more on my wells cargo landscaping trailer I never rotate them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Huber

customer_reviews.title: great tires so far
customer_reviews.text: great tires so far. cant beat the price. have them on a car hauler flat bed. went form a C to a load range D they are much better. mounted them myself on some bare rims, with some tire spoons. they are vary balanced as is, NO shaky, shaky even at 65 mph unloaded or loaded. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kendra grant

customer_reviews.title: If you're tire shopping for 8 ply radial trailer tires for a good price then stop looking and put 'em in your ...
customer_reviews.text: Top notch! Delivery was faster than Prime! Tires appear to be stout and without any defects. Mounted on a 16' tandem axle trailer. I've only hauled some firewood (a heavy load) so far but I don't foresee any problems. I saw comments regarding "date tampering", as in the date stamp was blurred; This was true on my tires but I have no concerns since the tires are not retreads or blems. If you're tire shopping for 8 ply radial trailer tires for a good price then stop looking and put 'em in your cart. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on replacement tires and 8 ply radials to boot! Local price was twice as much for a single tire as what Amazon charged for two! They pull great, ware evenly, and ride smooth. What more could you want on a utility trailer.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: greatest prices!
customer_reviews.text: greatest prices !!!! Strong side walls, Stiff tread. looks to be a great tire. Haven't gone on a trip yet ..Old Goodyear tire man.

customer_reviews.title: decent economical tire
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my double axle boat trailer. I have had these on for about six months now and have been very pleased. They are economical and after hauling the boat to the lake every other weekend during boating season they show no signs of wear. So far I am happy and I would buy again if needed. I would recommend so far and I'll be sure to update if anything comes up.

product_meta.title: Freestar M-108 8 Ply D Load Radial Trailer Tire (2057515)
product_meta.description: Trailer Tire. Tire Size - 205/75R15. Tire Weight Rating - 1820 Lbs. Tire Type - Radial. Load Range - D. Tire Section Width - 205. Tire Aspect Ratio - 75. Fits Rim Size Of - 15". Color - Blackwall. Pack Quanity - 1 Unit
feature_bullets: Tire Type - Trailer Only, Not For Vehicular Use
Tire Load Range - Load Range D = 8 Ply Construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars299 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
